img.alt: Win every micro-moment with a better mobile strategy

row3.text: It stands for Remarketing List on Search Ads: showing ads to people who have previously visited your site when they search for your targeted keywords on Google.

img.alt: Win every micro-moment with a better mobile strategy

row3.text: It helps segment your customer base on Google search in 2 types: those who have never been to your website and those who have. The latter is supposed to be the more potential group of customers and where your focus should be!
